mapper.delete: update members set delflag=1 where u_id = #{uid}
mapper.select: select u_id, user_name, password, email, nickname, join_date, phone_number from members where u_id = #{uid} and delflag = 0
select user_name, u_id, password, email, nickname, join_date, phone_number from members where delflag=0 order by join_date
mapper.insert: insert into members (user_name, u_id, phone_number, password, email, nickname, join_date) values (#{username}, #{uid}, #{phonenumber}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickname}, now())
mapper.select: select nickname, u_id, email from members where u_id = #{uid} and password = #{password} and delflag = 0
select nickname, u_id, email, join_date from members where u_id = #{uid} and delflag = 0
